member.name: M:Spring2.Core.ResourceManager.Facade.ResourceEditor.GetContexts
member.summary: Returns a StringTypeList of all contexts in the DB.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.ResourceManager.Facade.ResourceEditor.GetFields(Spring2.Core.Types.StringType)
